verses.verse: "Keep <S%H2790>silent<s%> before <S%H339>me,<s%> islands, and let the <S%H3816>peoples<s%> <S%H2498>renew<s%> their <S%H3581>strength.<s%> Let them come <S%H5066>near,<s%> then let them <S%H1696>speak.<s%> <S%H7126>Let<s%>'s meet <S%H3162>together<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

Who has raised <S%H5782>up<s%> one from the <S%H4217>east?<s%> Who <S%H7121>called<s%> him to his <S%H7272>foot<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness?<s%> He <S%H5414>hands<s%> over <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>to<s%> <S%H7287>him,<s%> and makes him rule over <S%H4428>kings.<s%> He <S%H5414>gives<s%> them like the <S%H6083>dust<s%> to his <S%H2719>sword,<s%> like the <S%H5086>driven<s%> <S%H7179>stubble<s%> to his <S%H7198>bow.<s%>
He <S%H7291>pursues<s%> <S%H5674>them,<s%> and passes by <S%H7965>safely,<s%> Even by a <S%H734>way<s%> that he had not <S%H935>gone<s%> with his <S%H7272>feet.<s%>

Who has <S%H6466>worked<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7121>it,<s%> calling the <S%H1755>generations<s%> from the <S%H7218>beginning?<s%> <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, the <S%H7223>first,<s%> and with the <S%H314>last,<s%> I am he."
The <S%H339>islands<s%> have <S%H7200>seen,<s%> and <S%H3372>fear.<s%> The <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H2729>tremble.<s%> They <S%H7126>approach,<s%> and <S%H857>come.<s%>
<S%H376>Everyone<s%> <S%H5826>helps<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%> They <S%H559>say<s%> to their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> "Be <S%H2388>strong!<s%>"

So the <S%H2796>carpenter<s%> <S%H2388>encourages<s%> the <S%H6884>goldsmith.<s%> He who <S%H2505>smoothes<s%> with the <S%H6360>hammer<s%> encourages him who <S%H1986>strikes<s%> the <S%H6471>anvil,<s%> <S%H559>saying<s%> of the <S%H1694>soldering,<s%> "It is <S%H2896>good;<s%>" and he <S%H2388>fastens<s%> it with <S%H4548>nails,<s%> that it might not <S%H4131>totter.<s%>
"But <S%H3478>you,<s%> Israel, my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> whom I have <S%H977>chosen,<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> my <S%H157>friend,<s%>

You whom I have <S%H2388>taken<s%> hold of from the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> from its <S%H678>corners,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5650>you,<s%> 'You are my servant, I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> you and not cast you <S%H3988>away;<s%>'

<S%H3372>Don't<s%> you be afraid, for I am with <S%H8159>you.<s%> Don't be dismayed, for I am your <S%H430>God.<s%> I will <S%H553>strengthen<s%> <S%H5826>you.<s%> Yes, I will help <S%H8551>you.<s%> Yes, I will uphold you with the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of my <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%>

<S%H2734>Behold,<s%> all those who are incensed against you will be <S%H954>disappointed<s%> and <S%H3637>confounded.<s%> <S%H582>Those<s%> who <S%H7379>strive<s%> with you will be like <S%H6>nothing,<s%> and shall perish.

You will <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H4672>them,<s%> and won't find <S%H582>them,<s%> even those who <S%H4695>contend<s%> with <S%H4421>you.<s%> Those who war against you will be as <S%H657>nothing,<s%> as a non-existent thing.
For <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh your <S%H430>God,<s%> will <S%H2388>hold<s%> your right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> <S%H559>saying<s%> to <S%H3372>you,<s%> 'Don't be afraid. I will help <S%H5826>you.<s%>'

<S%H3372>Don't<s%> be afraid, you <S%H8438>worm<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and you <S%H4962>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> I will <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H5002>you,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "and your <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> is the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H7760>Behold,<s%> I have made you into a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H2742>sharp<s%> <S%H4173>threshing<s%> instrument <S%H1167>with<s%> <S%H6374>teeth.<s%> You will <S%H1758>thresh<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and beat them <S%H1854>small,<s%> and will <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H1389>hills<s%> like <S%H4671>chaff.<s%>

You will <S%H2219>winnow<s%> <S%H7307>them,<s%> and the wind will carry them <S%H5375>away,<s%> and the <S%H5591>whirlwind<s%> will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> <S%H1523>them.<s%> You will rejoice in <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> You will <S%H1984>glory<s%> in the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

The <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> and there is <S%H3956>none.<s%> Their tongue <S%H5405>fails<s%> for <S%H6772>thirst.<s%> <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, will <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H430>them.<s%> I, the God of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> will not forsake <S%H5800>them.<s%>

I will <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H5104>rivers<s%> on the bare <S%H8205>heights,<s%> and <S%H4599>springs<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1237>valleys.<s%> I will <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> a <S%H98>pool<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> and the <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4161>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H730>cedar,<s%> <S%H7848>acacia,<s%> <S%H1918>myrtle,<s%> and <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H7848>trees<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%> I will <S%H7760>set<s%> fir <S%H6086>trees,<s%> <S%H8410>pine,<s%> and box <S%H1265>trees<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> in the <S%H6160>desert;<s%>

that they may <S%H7200>see,<s%> <S%H3045>know,<s%> <S%H7760>consider,<s%> and <S%H7919>understand<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> that the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H6918>this,<s%> and the Holy One of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has created <S%H1254>it.<s%>

<S%H7126>Produce<s%> your <S%H7379>cause,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> "Bring <S%H5066>forth<s%> your <S%H6110>strong<s%> <S%H559>reasons,<s%>" says the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

"Let them <S%H5066>announce,<s%> and <S%H5046>declare<s%> to us what shall <S%H7136>happen.<s%> <S%H5046>Declare<s%> the former <S%H7223>things,<s%> what they <S%H7760>are,<s%> that we may consider <S%H3045>them,<s%> and know the latter <S%H319>end<s%> of <S%H8085>them;<s%> or show us things to <S%H935>come.<s%>

<S%H5046>Declare<s%> the things that are to <S%H857>come<s%> <S%H268>hereafter,<s%> that we may <S%H3045>know<s%> that you are <S%H430>gods.<s%> <S%H3190>Yes,<s%> do good, or do <S%H7489>evil,<s%> that we may be <S%H8159>dismayed,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> it <S%H3162>together.<s%>
<S%H369>Behold,<s%> you are of nothing, and your <S%H6467>work<s%> is of <S%H659>nothing.<s%> He who <S%H977>chooses<s%> you is an <S%H8441>abomination.<s%>

"I have raised <S%H5782>up<s%> one from the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and he has <S%H857>come;<s%> from the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> one who <S%H7121>calls<s%> on my <S%H8034>name;<s%> and he shall <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H5461>rulers<s%> as on <S%H2563>mortar,<s%> and as the <S%H3335>potter<s%> <S%H7429>treads<s%> <S%H2916>clay.<s%>

Who has <S%H5046>declared<s%> it from the <S%H7218>beginning,<s%> that we may <S%H3045>know?<s%> And <S%H6440>before,<s%> that we may <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H6662><s%> 'He is right?' <S%H5046>Surely,<s%> there is no one who declares. <S%H8085>Surely,<s%> there is no one who shows. <S%H8085>Surely,<s%> there is no one who hears your <S%H561>words.<s%>

I am the <S%H7223>first<s%> to say to <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H2009><s%> 'Behold, <S%H2009>look<s%> at <S%H5414>them;<s%>' and I will give one who brings good <S%H1319>news<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
When I <S%H7200>look,<s%> there is no <S%H376>man;<s%> even among them there is no <S%H3289>counselor<s%> <S%H7592>who,<s%> when I ask of <S%H7725>them,<s%> can answer a <S%H1697>word.<s%>
<S%H4639>Behold,<s%> all of them, their works are <S%H205>vanity<s%> and <S%H657>nothing.<s%> Their molten <S%H5262>images<s%> are <S%H7307>wind<s%> and <S%H8414>confusion.<s%>
